        <div class="grid-container" id="main-content">
                            <div class="grid-x grid-margin-x">
    <div class="small-12 medium-12 large-9 cell">

<div class="freeStarFragrantica" align="center" data-freestar-ad="__300x300" id="fragranticacom_perfume_incontent_1" v-pre>
</div></div></div><div class="grid-x grid-margin-x grid-margin-y"><div class="cell small-6"><likes-rating :perfume_id="43808" chart="show" type-chart="small-chart" colors="retro"></likes-rating></div><div class="cell small-6"><seasons-rating :perfume_id="43808" chart="show" type-chart="small-chart" colors="retro"></seasons-rating></div><div class="small-12 medium-6 text-center" style="max-height: 50px"><div itemprop="aggregateRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/AggregateRating" itemscope><p class="info-note">Perfume rating&nbsp;<span itemprop="ratingValue">4.00</span>&nbsp;out of&nbsp;<span itemprop="bestRating">5</span> with&nbsp;<span itemprop="ratingCount" content="743">743</span> votes<meta itemprop="reviewCount" content="87"/></p></div></div></div><div class="grid-x grid-margin-x grid-margin-y"><div class="cell small-12" itemprop="description" v-pre><p><b>Clandestine Clara </b> by <b>Penhaligon's</b> is a Woody Spicy fragrance for women. <b>Clandestine Clara </b> was launched in 2017. </p><div v-pre class='fragrantica-blockquote'><p>Pehaligon's: "Allow me to present to you the unofficial side of Lord Georges dynasty, beginning with - as we have come to know her - Clandestine Clara. And isnt she a complex creature A forceful personality, spicy but equally sweet, she has travelled in exotic countries and company - and in her smoky, velvety, woody air you may detect a memory (or three) of his Lordship (One would certainly never guess the lady also smokes). She is rebellious, contradictory, independent, unconventional - a woman ahead of her time. But above all, as you will discover, she is a true gourmand, completely delectable (and Lord George would know)."</p>

                        </div>
                        <div class="vote-box-sp-ai">
                             <span>
                            <i class="far fa-thumbs-down"></i>
                             </span>
                            <div class="num-votes-sp"><span style="font-size: 0.8rem;">12</span></div>
                        </div>
                    </div>
                    </div>
                    Not a long-lasting scent on some
                </div>
                            <div class="cell small-12" style="display: inline-flex; margin: 0.4rem;word-wrap: break-word;padding: 0 0.6rem 0 0.6rem;">
                    <div class="fa-lg" style="display: flex; align-items: center; color: grey; cursor: pointer;">

                    Some may find it too old-fashioned

    <div class="strike-title"><span>All Reviews By Date</span></div>

padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1829234">Sherry563</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-11-26">11/26/24 11:52</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This is more of a note for myself to reference at a later date.  This a powdery, sweet, and spicy scent on me. Smells a bit unisex but leans feminine. The fragrance is reminiscent of Khamrah but much smoother and refined.  I also get hints of baby powder and chestnuts or tonka beans which are not listed in the notes.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="43808"comment_id="2362057"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Clandestine-Clara-43808.html?ccid=2362057#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2360039" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.85);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; <br />
Very unisex in my opinion. On the right person this could smell very good, sadly I am not that person and I prefer something more feminine and sweet.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="43808"comment_id="2360039"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Clandestine-Clara-43808.html?ccid=2360039#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2337517" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.86);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;want&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; One moment it smells like an elegant old lady, the next it's a bit more masculine. It's not something I usually go for but I can't stop smelling my wrist. I'll keep exploring it.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="43808"comment_id="2334557"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Clandestine-Clara-43808.html?ccid=2334557#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.85); padding: 0; border: none; margin: 0;"><!-- Tag ID: fragranticacom_perfume_incontent_6 -->

padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2331082" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="secilkrts"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1869761"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1869761.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="secilkrts" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2331082ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2331082" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.85); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1869761">secilkrts</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-10-29">10/29/24 02:39</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I think it has a bit of a poetic air, it is a warm scent and despite the sweet notes in it, I think it is a masculine scent. Maybe it is the scent of a man you will fall in love with. It has become my favorite scent lately.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="43808"comment_id="2331082"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Clandestine-Clara-43808.html?ccid=2331082#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2325646" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.85);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2325646" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="fpih"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/14977"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.14977.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="fpih" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Lancome/Oud-Bouquet-39739.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.39739.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Oud Bouquet"title="Oud Bouquet"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2325646ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2325646" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.85); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/14977">fpih</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-10-23">10/23/24 22:35</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>lejaimlefunk who likened it to the old Cara by Farmacia ss annunziata was spot on; This is the exact same fragrance in a bit louder mode. I loved Cara and I sure love this one, but they both lack any lasting power. This lasts 4 hours  -or 5 on a very good day- while Cara is gone in 2-3 hours. The vanilla-almond accord is very soothing and beautiful, but with no projection or duration they're both no worth the FB for me.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="43808"comment_id="2325646"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Clandestine-Clara-43808.html?ccid=2325646#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2287141" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.86);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2287141" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="pollilyo"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2082294"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2082294.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="pollilyo" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2287141ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck4x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2287141" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.86); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2082294">pollilyo</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-09-18">09/18/24 11:45</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Clandestine Clara is Lord George's mistress. <br />
<br />
Lord George seems to think he can cover up a recent encounter with the smell of expensive rum and cigars, but at close range you can detect the remaining trace of Clara's sweet perfume, who doesn't seem to need to cover up an encounter with a man, because you can notice the loudness of the alcohol, dry woods, and tobacco, which will eventually subside and drown in vanilla</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="43808"comment_id="2287141"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Clandestine-Clara-43808.html?ccid=2287141#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2241599" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.7);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2241599" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="lejaimlefunk"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1587912"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="lejaimlefunk" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Mancera/Red-Tobacco-46663.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.46663.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Red Tobacco"title="Red Tobacco"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2241599ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2241599" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.7); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1587912">lejaimlefunk</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-08-07">08/07/24 06:36</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I sampled this in a UK store recently and the first thing that came into my mind was Cara by Farmacia SS. Annunziata. Perhaps the name 'Clara' is a complete coincidence but I do wonder..<br />
<br />
The opening is very sweet, marshmallow/playdough like (as above, identical to Cara) but to be fair, it dries down into something quite different with an almost floral vibe which goes against the note listing. <br />
<br />
Would I spend 220 in the uk for a 75ml bottle when I could pick up a 100ml bottle of the aforementioned discontinued Cara on ebay for around 100.... absolutely not. <br />
<br />
That said, longevity on my wrist was excellent and it still scores a solid 8/10 despite the high price tag.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="43808"comment_id="2241599"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Clandestine-Clara-43808.html?ccid=2241599#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2185644" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.75);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:2,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2185644" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="faunwand"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1220622"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1220622.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="faunwand" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Clarins/Eau-Ressourcante-2827.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.2827.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Eau Ressourcante"title="Eau Ressourcante"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2185644ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck5x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2185644" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.75); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1220622">faunwand</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-06-12">06/12/24 02:02</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This scent has a vibe of slipping into a cozy cashmere sweater on a winter day. It's labeled 'for women' but I think anyone could enjoy it. It has a classy vibe that screams sophistication. The rum at the start is a fancy touch. It feels smooth and luxurious. The cinnamon gives it a spicy kick and the vanilla adds a sweet creaminess. Patchouli makes it a bit earthy at the end.Overall, it's classy and timeless.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="43808"comment_id="2185644"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Clandestine-Clara-43808.html?ccid=2185644#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2143074" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.78);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2143074" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="2bClare"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1961281"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1961281.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="2bClare" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Hermes/Hermessence-Agar-Ebene-48131.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.48131.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Hermessence Agar Ebene"title="Hermessence Agar Ebene"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2143074ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck4x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2143074" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.78); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1961281">2bClare</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-05-02">05/02/24 03:35</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Clandestine Clara is the most user friendly and feminine booze perfume Ive smelled. Its almost a skin scent, but anyone with permission will want to come in closer to smell this. Its a very light but enveloping blanket of warm ambery spice and vanilla floating in a cloud of boozy vapor. Its really lovely and is quite linear with no one note dominating the others but instead they all work together to create this warm delicious veil. Not until the dry down do woods take over but unfortunately on my skin that was in  a couple hours with the scent itself only lasting about 3-4 hours. So the downsides are its expensive, it doesnt project much and it doesnt last long. Upsides are its delicious, pretty universally so, and the bottle is fun as well.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="43808"comment_id="2143074"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Clandestine-Clara-43808.html?ccid=2143074#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2126064" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.76);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2126064" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Pilikins"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/203182"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.203182.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Pilikins" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2126064ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2126064" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.76); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/203182">Pilikins</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-04-15">04/15/24 23:51</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This has an amazing opening- so boozy and delicious. It is a really solid vanilla amber with prominent woodsy undertones. It is pretty unisex and has great longevity. The bottle is very beautiful. I think I prefer Cafe Chantant because it is less woody but just as deep, vanillary and boozy. However, I am glad to add this to my collection of amber vanillas. Yummy</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="43808"comment_id="2126064"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Clandestine-Clara-43808.html?ccid=2126064#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2092515" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.78);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; Megszlalsig hasonlak<br />
Clandestine Clara Penhaligon's=Lattafa sheikh al shuyukh=lancome oud bouquet</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="43808"comment_id="2026186"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Clandestine-Clara-43808.html?ccid=2026186#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2019165" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.84);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2019165" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="lorna.1"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1133466"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1133466.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="lorna.1" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Yves-Saint-Laurent/Babycat-73149.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.73149.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Babycat"title="Babycat"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2019165ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2019165" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.84); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1133466">lorna.1</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-01-03">01/03/24 13:58</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>It is a super sexy, lovely, warm, inviting fragrance that is a nose burier and one of the most underrated and ignored Penhaligon. It's unisex, and I love to wear it. Despite not usually going for booze in my perfumes, I adore the rum note in this, but it is just enough to make me feel like a flapper in the late 20s sitting in the cocktail bar.<br />
The amber provides the warmth to match it, and I think a liberal spray lasts 6 hours on me with a little cream on my skin. It dries down perfectly for a coffee after cocktails. IFYKWIM!</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="43808"comment_id="2019165"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Clandestine-Clara-43808.html?ccid=2019165#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2015959" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.88);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2015959" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="bunnykat"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1932083"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="bunnykat" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Carolina-Herrera/Nightfall-Patchouli-31054.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.31054.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Nightfall Patchouli"title="Nightfall Patchouli"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2015959ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck4x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2015959" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.88); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1932083">bunnykat</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-12-31">12/31/23 04:37</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>If you get a tar-like smell from Lattafa, Ari and/or Zara perfumes, there's a good chance you'll get it from this too. I've been told it's a fixative called veramoss. It comes in after the initial notes and makes the whole perfume smell acrid and terrible. I think I would have liked this otherwise but the veramoss smell ruins everything it touches if you can smell it (some can't apparently).</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="43808"comment_id="2015959"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Clandestine-Clara-43808.html?ccid=2015959#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2013741" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.86);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2013741" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="lestypenguins"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1621193"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="lestypenguins" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2013741ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2013741" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.86); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1621193">lestypenguins</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-12-28">12/28/23 21:01</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Like many have said, this is sweet and boozy. It's rich and warm, the perfect autumn or winter fragrance. My nose didn't get the patchouli, but the cinnamon is certainly warmer than I was expecting, which may be due to the patchouli! I don't think I love this enough to accept the price, but it is a decant I will enjoy.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="43808"comment_id="2013741"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Clandestine-Clara-43808.html?ccid=2013741#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2000068" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.76);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:2,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2000068" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Atinea Noir"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/84691"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.84691.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Atinea Noir" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Guerlain/Mitsouko-Eau-de-Parfum-25316.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.25316.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Mitsouko Eau de Parfum"title="Mitsouko Eau de Parfum"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2000068ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2000068" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.76); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/84691">Atinea Noir</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-12-13">12/13/23 06:00</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Sweet boozy opening followed by something slightly bitter like almond or tonka. An hour later the fragrance subsides into a pretty but faint warm ambery accord that sits close to the skin and disappears shortly thereafter. Slightly better performance on clothes, but quite underwhelming overall.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="43808"comment_id="2000068"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Clandestine-Clara-43808.html?ccid=2000068#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1961434" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.75);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:2,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1569375">Nosey Nelli</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-10-26">10/26/23 09:40</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I only get old-bookstore vibes from this... sadly, I was expecting so much more but I just got a sharp patchouli, a woody-paper note, and maybe rum but in a very flat way. Didn't unfold after the drydown for me. Bottle is a beautiful addition to any vanity though!</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="43808"comment_id="1961434"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Clandestine-Clara-43808.html?ccid=1961434#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1950795" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.71);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1950795" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="amnebe"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1645213"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1645213.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="amnebe" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Jo-Malone-London/Wood-Sage-Sea-Salt-25529.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.25529.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Wood Sage & Sea Salt"title="Wood Sage & Sea Salt"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1950795ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x1"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1950795" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.71); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1645213">amnebe</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-10-13">10/13/23 06:50</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>With the price of a bottle of this perfume, I expected something much better when I tried the sample. It starts off smelling like generic old-fashioned perfume and has some patchouli in it. Overall, it's really sharp smelling and almost masculine. The vanilla starts to show up eventually, which makes it better. However, it's not very memorable overall. There's nothing to draw me back to this perfume really. It sounds like something I'd adore, but it just doesn't deliver.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="43808"comment_id="1950795"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Clandestine-Clara-43808.html?ccid=1950795#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1928427" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.76);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1928427" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Clairexoxo"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1617341"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1617341.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Clairexoxo" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1928427ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck4x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1928427" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.76); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1617341">Clairexoxo</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-09-15">09/15/23 04:38</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>A lovely, wearable, feminine, and elevated boozy fragrance. The ambery and woody accords add great substance to the composition and the hints of cinnamon mixed with the boozy notes adds some deliciousness!<br />
<br />
As time passes by, the woody accords gain in presence and become a bit more natural-wood-smelling  which is very nice!<br />
<br />
I get 4 hours on my skin and 8-10 hours on clothing with moderate projection. <br />
<br />
I really like it ! Great for nights out during the Fall.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="43808"comment_id="1928427"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Clandestine-Clara-43808.html?ccid=1928427#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1925650" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.73);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1914737" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Charmedbymeghan"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1736880"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="Charmedbymeghan" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1914737ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1914737" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.74); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1736880">Charmedbymeghan</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-08-29">08/29/23 16:48</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I only have a sample, and while I do like this - I don't love it.   Maybe that will change by the time my sample is done.  But there are other fragrances in this genre that I think I enjoy more.  And they also cost less per bottle, and the bottles have more ML in them.  <br />
<br />
I was really hoping to fall in love with one of these Penhaligons bottles because they're so pretty.  And I heard they're fragrances are phenomenal.  So far, I've tested this and Bewitching Yasmine.  Neither are giving me the feels right from the get-go.  I do like this better than BY so far though. <br />
<br />
I think these are priced too high.  They're not any better than other niche fragrances I can get for half the price.  And they definitely are not as good as the niche fragrances I've tried in the same price range.   Just my 2 cents.  Maybe I need to try some different ones?</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="43808"comment_id="1914737"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Clandestine-Clara-43808.html?ccid=1914737#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1869230" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.76);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; So far Ive enjoyed all of the Penhaligans that I have tried, but this one is my favorite.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="43808"comment_id="1869230"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Clandestine-Clara-43808.html?ccid=1869230#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1809242" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.84);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; Crazy combo but I am growing to like it! The dry down is very much boozy rum vanilla. For some reason this fragrance  reminds me of the song Maneater by Nelly Furtado. Kinky, Crazy and Girlbossing Like she's a lip biter FOR SURE.  I cannot wrap my head around this perfume! I'd say it's a good thing because, you want your POI wondering how can solve this enigma of attraction Sillage is moderate, and longevity is wonderful. Very impressive perfume<br />
<br />
Zodiac Trio<br />
Capricorn Aquarius Gemini/Taurus</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="43808"comment_id="1809242"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Clandestine-Clara-43808.html?ccid=1809242#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1809168" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.74);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:2,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1809168" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Sniffathon"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1357164"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1357164.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Sniffathon" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1809168ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x1"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1809168" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.74); I oversprayed and within 30 minutes there was barely any projection. Love!</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="43808"comment_id="1783289"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Clandestine-Clara-43808.html?ccid=1783289#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1772336" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.79);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1772336" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Lalunalynn"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1169933"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1169933.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Lalunalynn" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Changing-Constance-50256.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.50256.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Changing Constance"title="Changing Constance"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1772336ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1772336" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.79); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1169933">Lalunalynn</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-03-01">03/01/23 12:34</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>So I got this today and I have been racking my brain trying to think of what it reminds me of. It has a bit of a vintage edge to it and it's wafting something really familiar to me.... Its just come to me! It reminds me of Samsara! But the OG, not the current formulation. When I put my nose to my wrist it doesn't smell like it, but wafting in the air I get that distinct Samsara vibe. Off the top its spicy play dough with a marzipan/almond nuance. This isn't boozy, it's dry and powdery with a touch of sweetness. The dry down is where this frag shines for me. The play dough burns off a fair bit and you are left with a creamy vanilla, cinnamon and rich amber that is a touch powdery from the lingering playdough. Its such a shame that when it gets to the divine dry down it is almost gone. 2 hours and it's a skin scent, and it only projects for maybe 20 minutes. For the price thats a joke. <br />
Its a true unisex fragrance.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="43808"comment_id="1772336"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Clandestine-Clara-43808.html?ccid=1772336#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1741668" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.9);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1741668" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="bratsnax"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1669014"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="bratsnax" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1741668ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1741668" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.9); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1669014">bratsnax</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-01-23">01/23/23 17:21</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This perfume has definitely grown on me since my first spray. The rum is very noticeable on first spray, but just like any night of drinking, the striking taste of the first drink becomes more palatable after the third and fourth drink. <br />
<br />
Its a very warm sexy scent, with beautiful notes of amber and vanilla. However, there is a a faint smell of something reminiscent of sunscreen and on my skin it smells a bit powdery. I only got a tester and as much as I enjoy this scent, I dont enjoy it enough on my skin to buy the full bottle.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="43808"comment_id="1741668"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Clandestine-Clara-43808.html?ccid=1741668#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1718072" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.83);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1701305" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Rcates78"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1343852"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1343852.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Rcates78" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Tommy-Hilfiger/Tommy-Girl-3016.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.3016.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Tommy Girl"title="Tommy Girl"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1701305ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1701305" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.77); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1343852">Rcates78</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-12-03">12/03/22 10:09</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Loving Clara in our mild SoCal winter right now.  The cinnamon is divine - typically leaning more "holiday candle" as a fragrance note, I find, but more freshly, finely grated here.  All of the notes are well done, in fact.  The "rum" isn't too boozy (more like the remnant in a glass), the patch is soft and dry (as opposed to loamy and dirty), and the vanilla is fresh, rather than syrupy.  Clara is well-blended, slightly intriguing, likeable with a compassionately tamed rebellious streak.  She's intentional, meticulously put together, and self controlled in a practiced and unstrained manner.  I've taken an instant affection to her.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="43808"comment_id="1701305"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Clandestine-Clara-43808.html?ccid=1701305#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1684720" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.87);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:5,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1661531" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Marie76"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/138192"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.138192.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Marie76" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Estee-Lauder/Tender-Light-69708.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.69708.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Tender Light"title="Tender Light"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1661531ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1661531" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.79); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/138192">Marie76</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-10-08">10/08/22 05:10</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I like the amber in this (a very difficult note for me), it makes this round and feminine despite the woodsiness and lack of  regular "feminine" notes, but in a way it's too feminine, I think there's a very sweet patchouli in it, something that cheapens it every so slightly. It's a very good perfume, just not "me". The description about an adventurous woman doesn't suit it. This is the perfume a regal but maternal older matriarch would wear in her opulent rooms.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="43808"comment_id="1661531"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Clandestine-Clara-43808.html?ccid=1661531#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1652232" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.9);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:2,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="2"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; Its actually the fragrance that made me enter the fragrance world. Anyways for me, I think its very sexy, unique, and has an enticing scent trail.<br />
<br />
Scent uniqueness: 9/10 <br />
Scent itself: 10/10 <br />
Longevity: 9/10 (amazing dry down) <br />
Projection: 8.5/10<br />
; spray a lot for better Performance <br />
