Will happily sell my full bottle (used maybe 3 times).</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="43808"comment_id="1586968"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Clandestine-Clara-43808.html?ccid=1586968#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1579994" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.72);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1579994" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="elledeelee"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1178574"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1178574.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="elledeelee" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Lacoste-Fragrances/Lacoste-Pour-Femme-Elixir-53415.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.53415.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Lacoste Pour Femme Elixir"title="Lacoste Pour Femme Elixir"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1579994ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1579994" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.72); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1178574">elledeelee</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-06-08">06/08/22 03:03</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This opens with a blast of alcohol, is citrusy and aromatic, with a background of musty chamomile tea maybe? Not what I was expecting at all. I am finding it extremely cold for an amber, all cologny and masculine. Eventually it does transform into a sweeter, powdery amber scent, somewhat reminiscent of MFK's Grand Soir. But it takes a long time for this fragrance to start even resembling the notes listed in the pyramid, by which time it's already just a skin scent. Almost zero projection and longevity. My very first experience of Penhaligon's and a pretty disappointing one at that.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="43808"comment_id="1579994"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Clandestine-Clara-43808.html?ccid=1579994#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1578734" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.88);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:2,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1578734" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Bgcampbell"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1515349"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="Bgcampbell" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1578734ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1578734" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.88); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1515349">Bgcampbell</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-06-06">06/06/22 06:12</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>First let me say, I joined Fragrantica in order to review this fragrance. It is so delightful; I feel like an empress every time I wear it! I get a balanced sweetness and want to smell my skin all day long. But that is the problem - once sprayed, you can only smell it close on your skin after an hour. There is absolutely no sillage on me and I get roughly two hours of wear before the scent disappears. For a $300 bottle, I expected much, much more.<br />
<br />
Certainly a good blind buy if you can get it for 70% off the retail price.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="43808"comment_id="1578734"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Clandestine-Clara-43808.html?ccid=1578734#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1542874" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.87);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1542874" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Q80"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/698615"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.698615.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Q80" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1542874ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1542874" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.87); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/698615">Q80</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-04-13">04/13/22 18:49</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Now Clara is kind of weird! i get a sweet saliva thingy! and i believe it is from the rum because of it's sticky sweet bitterness touch! I think the sweet is overly presented here with the vanilla, cinnamon, &amp; sweet amber but the patchouli, and the cedar are trying to lower the leverage somehow but i guess the rum ruined the equation a bit to add more sweet plus some bitter touch.<br />
<br />
This blend is sold out in where i live, dunno wither if it's the best selling or they didn't bring enough pieces! after all, it is a fairly nice blend, &amp; i think i can compare it somehow with helfeti.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="43808"comment_id="1542874"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Clandestine-Clara-43808.html?ccid=1542874#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1539926" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.84);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1539926" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="upk"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1476367"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1476367.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="upk" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1539926ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1539926" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.84); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1476367">upk</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-04-09">04/09/22 01:49</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>It's just amber.  Vanilla and lamb did not appear on my skin.  If you're looking for rum, we recommend Radcliffe from the same portrait series, and if you're looking for sweetness, we recommend Constance, which has a strong sweetness of caramel.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="43808"comment_id="1539926"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Clandestine-Clara-43808.html?ccid=1539926#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1529654" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.76);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1529654" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="SailorV"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/955817"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.955817.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="SailorV" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1529654ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1529654" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.76); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/955817">SailorV</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-03-24">03/24/22 11:13</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Another beautiful winter warmer in Penhaligons' Portraits collection. I don't love Clara quite as much as Yasmine and Constance, but I like her a lot.<br />
<br />
To my nose this is a patchy, boozy semi-gourmand that smells just like the notes list suggests. I just can't believe that patchouli is the least voted note on here right now, it's the strongest note to me. <br />
This patch is dry and earthy. At first I found it too dusty in the opening, but then I noticed it's smoother when you do a small spray from afar. Then the patch feels just dry enough to balance the very warm vanilla and keep the scent from going too foody. I think some unnamed woodsy notes also add a little balancing sharpness. <br />
Rum is definitely the other key note in this. It's intoxicating, rich and round, with a lush, humid texture that makes the scent so much more lively and fun. Together with the cinnamon it creates a hot, almost fiery sensation, which I love but don't find in perfumes too often.<br />
<br />
Every time I tried this, some of it remained on my skin over night or after a quick shower, so the longevity is good. The final skinscent is a very pleasant, warm and creamy vanillic amber with a hint of a diffuse woods and spices.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="43808"comment_id="1529654"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Clandestine-Clara-43808.html?ccid=1529654#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1526541" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.73);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:2,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="2"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1526541" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Mira J"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1379804"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1379804.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Mira J" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Dior/Vanilla-Diorama-68198.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.68198.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Vanilla Diorama"title="Vanilla Diorama"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1526541ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1526541" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.73); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1379804">Mira J</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-03-19">03/19/22 15:32</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I almost blind bought this as the notes were a no brainer to me but thankfully purchased a sample first. That dreaded play-doh vibe....noooo. I wonder what is giving off that scent to my nose? I can NOT deal with fragrances that give me any type of play-doh nuances. You couldn't pay me to wear hypnotic poison. So let down.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="43808"comment_id="1526541"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Clandestine-Clara-43808.html?ccid=1526541#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1519763" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.7);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:2,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="2"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1519763" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="thegoob"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1112396"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1112396.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="thegoob" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Indult/Tihota-4346.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.4346.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Tihota"title="Tihota"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1519763ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1519763" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.7); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1112396">thegoob</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-03-09">03/09/22 12:29</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>On my skin I very sincerely got realistic, simplistic, play doh and baby wipes. An hour or so later I got some nicely done smoke but the initial character did not change. This, to me, is not a gourmand but a very cosmetic vanilla-amber that has the aforementioned uncanny resemblance to infant products. My perception seems to be uncommon, however, so those around you will probably enjoy this. Its not for me unfortunately!</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="43808"comment_id="1519763"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Clandestine-Clara-43808.html?ccid=1519763#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1512382" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.84);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;want&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; Its so well blended and smells just like the notes would lead you to believe. I layer this with Boucheron Ambre DAlexandrie and its heaven.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="43808"comment_id="1512382"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Clandestine-Clara-43808.html?ccid=1512382#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1498857" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.78);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:2,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1498857" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="missloveschocolate"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/68454"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.68454.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="missloveschocolate" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Serge-Lutens/Un-Bois-Vanille-478.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.478.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Un Bois Vanille"title="Un Bois Vanille"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1498857ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1498857" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.78); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/68454">missloveschocolate</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-02-06">02/06/22 12:15</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Its funny but I hear notes that are not in the pyramid at all, like very bitter lemons and musc in the opening.<br />
On me, this potentially gorgeous perfume is out of balance: too much bitterness in the opening, too much cinnamon  just after, to the point that I feel it in my throat, patchouli seems a bit harsh also. I do like the amber here, its so rounded and soft. I got almost no rum. I will definitely give it another try but for now, for this price, its a hard no.<br />
As to the portraits story, this is actually the first of the portraits that Ive tried and maybe when youre into the story it gives you some kind of an extra depth, but just like that, on its own, this perfume is missing something.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="43808"comment_id="1498857"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Clandestine-Clara-43808.html?ccid=1498857#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1494690" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.82);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:4,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1494690" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Cherry_Darling"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1003821"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1003821.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Cherry_Darling" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Pascal-Morabito/Perle-Pour-Elle-47506.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.47506.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Perle Pour Elle"title="Perle Pour Elle"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1494690ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1494690" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.82); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1003821">Cherry_Darling</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-01-31">01/31/22 07:07</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I had high hopes for this one and it is indeed gorgeous. Warming, smooth amber vanilla, booze and patch. Exactly what I need on a cold winter's night. There is something a little piercing in here, may be the booze, but I'll have to let it dry down to assess thoroughly. Maybe a screetchy patch note? Overall it's gorgeous but this one note makes me a bit wary - for now. Edit: dries down a touch oudy, still a little too piercing. Lovely opening though.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="43808"comment_id="1494690"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Clandestine-Clara-43808.html?ccid=1494690#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1489338" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.8);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; Sprayed it on around 9am took a nap and woke up like what is that. I also sprayed on sweet by Brooklyn not sure if it's the combo or just this but lorddd. Instant buy! I will be using Nose Paris for the purchase as always!<br />
Update: wore this again on its own. Lord have mercy!! This is perfect for Valentines Day! The best Vanilla. The best anything. This beats so many.<br />
Update: tried Coromandel les Exclusifs and this is better IMO. When I tried Clara, I too got baby powder. After experiencing pure amber resin vs. Grand Soir. I'm more adapt to pure true amber! Give it a few chances, I once hated BR540 now I have almost everything from the line! Still waiting on my Peacock bottle along with VIW by Creed. If your scared of the price as mentioned try Nose $230 on there website! $65 savings free shipping &amp; 6 samples!</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="43808"comment_id="1489338"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Clandestine-Clara-43808.html?ccid=1489338#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1488657" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.77);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1488657" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="woodypei0821"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1234032"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1234032.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="woodypei0821" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Etat-Libre-d-Orange/Noel-au-Balcon-2195.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.2195.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Noel au Balcon"title="Noel au Balcon"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1488657ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1488657" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.77); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1234032">woodypei0821</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-01-22">01/22/22 11:27</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Smells like baby powder on me</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1475376" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="ssamhita"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1420430"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1420430.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="ssamhita" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Mugler/Angel-Nova-Eau-de-Toilette-67863.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.67863.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Angel Nova Eau de Toilette"title="Angel Nova Eau de Toilette"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1475376ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1475376" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.89); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1420430">ssamhita</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-01-03">01/03/22 03:02</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Looking at the accords, I simply knew this was for me. I love perfumes with smell all boozy and cinnamon-y with just a hint of tobacco on my husband, but he isnt a fan of those. Which is why I took to buying perfumes meant for men that smell like this! But this? Everything I want in a pretty bottle :) I might be a bit partial though - I was ready to love this even before I smelled it because of the copy from Penhaligons. I mean, Clara does sound like the woman I want to be. <br />
<br />
I know people have had issues with longevity and sillage but to be honest it doesnt seem to bother me. I am surrounded by a cinnamony spicy cloud that I am basking in. So, so unique. So different from any other perfume I am used to. It does border on unisex and I would love to smell this on a man! I imagine someone whos confident and willing to admit it wearing this one. This is the kind of perfume that youve got to know better to find the soft core within, know what I mean? Get past the hard exterior shell to find the warmth inside. Gorgeous smell!</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="43808"comment_id="1475376"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Clandestine-Clara-43808.html?ccid=1475376#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1472516" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.8);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:1,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1449230" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="lorna.1"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1133466"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1133466.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="lorna.1" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Yves-Saint-Laurent/Babycat-73149.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.73149.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Babycat"title="Babycat"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1449230ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1449230" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.77); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1133466">lorna.1</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2021-11-20">11/20/21 08:24</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This beauty is like an eclectic evening out as a seductress! <br />
At the very beginning, the experience is so fun and fizzy and very punchy with the yummy rum note. It is so pleasing and stays like this for a good hour with me, like a Christmas party vibe, with some time, it relaxes a little and allows the cinnamon and woods to really pop, still whiffs of rum but not so dazzling, more of a cocktail hour by the fire in an upscale hotel. <br />
<br />
Then the cosy dry-down, Vanilla amber and trails of the spicy rummy night linger. She is lovable and fun. I love her for the evening, I imagine wearing Feve D in the day and then adding her to it at night for a really yummy experience.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="43808"comment_id="1449230"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Clandestine-Clara-43808.html?ccid=1449230#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1442006" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.81);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;want&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1442006" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="ephye"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1411449"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="ephye" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1442006ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1442006" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.81); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1411449">ephye</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2021-11-07">11/07/21 18:40</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>It was really a love at firts sniff, just amazing, will definitly buy a full bottle. Even after 2 weeks on my top , i can still smell it</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="43808"comment_id="1442006"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Clandestine-Clara-43808.html?ccid=1442006#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1426316" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.88);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1426316" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="SmellyB"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1385461"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1385461.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="SmellyB" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Clandestine-Clara-43808.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.43808.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Clandestine Clara "title="Clandestine Clara "></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1426316ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck4x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1426316" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.88); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1385461">SmellyB</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2021-10-11">10/11/21 10:44</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I'm right in the middle on this one. It's attention grabbing at first spray, throws a wallop of a punch and then hides it's hands. It is sweet, it is boozy but there's no density to it. It almost come across to me as fizzy, like there are little tiny pockets of air filtering through the fragrance. It reminds me of a cherry cola. Amber-y it is, vanilla-sh...sure, but I have to be honest about my disappointment in it's sillage and longevity. I feel like I have to keep this uncapped and tucked in a hip sheath to spray at a moment's notice, lest I be accused of not having it on. <br />
<br />
I like it though. :)</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="43808"comment_id="1426316"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Clandestine-Clara-43808.html?ccid=1426316#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1405112" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.88);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1405112" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="CCClydes"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1369301"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1369301.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="CCClydes" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Goutal/Etoile-d-Une-Nuit-55228.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.55228.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="toile d'Une Nuit"title="toile d'Une Nuit"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1405112ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1405112" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.88); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1369301">CCClydes</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2021-09-05">09/05/21 18:50</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This is one of my favorite fall scents. It has all the guilty little pleasures I adore (vanilla, patchouli, spice and amber with that little tease of tobacco.) Its loud at the beginning but eases into the middle and eventually a warm and gentle vanilla sweater perfect for this chilly Southern evenings. It takes me to a hunting Lodge after dark when the cigars are fading and the Rum is in the final swigs before bedtime. I purchased Terrible Teddy for my husband at the same time as Clara and Im loving how they mix together. That hint of leather that Teddy adds to the party is like a borrowed Filson hunting coat to stave off the chill. Shes a keeper!</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="43808"comment_id="1405112"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Clandestine-Clara-43808.html?ccid=1405112#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1398540" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.89);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1398540" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="TunyaPe"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/733870"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.733870.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="TunyaPe" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Serge-Lutens/Fils-de-Joie-62872.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.62872.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Fils de Joie"title="Fils de Joie"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1398540ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1398540" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.89); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/733870">TunyaPe</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2021-08-25">08/25/21 08:21</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>The fragrance is totally my cup of tea (dark rum in a bottle) as it is spicy dark rum in a bottle BUT...<br />
<br />
Unlike the review below, I find the best part is actually the opening entering its mid-phase as the booziness is completely gone in the drydown (only vanilla-ey, powdery, a bit woody left as skin scent).<br />
<br />
Clara 'almost' reaches my favourite shelf. It is just not there yet. <br />
Despite it being deep, sensual, refined, boozy, mysterious, this beauty transforms too quickly and takes only 3-4 hours to the drydown phase that no longer excites me, and the sillage &amp; projection is not even great.<br />
<br />
However, I feel sexy wearing it. And even though the ingredient composition looks overdone, I have not smelled anything like Clara.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="43808"comment_id="1398540"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Clandestine-Clara-43808.html?ccid=1398540#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1372818" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.77);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1372818" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="kfrags88"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1340210"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1340210.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="kfrags88" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Xerjoff/XJ-1861-Naxos-30529.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.30529.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="XJ 1861 Naxos"title="XJ 1861 Naxos"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1372818ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1372818" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.77); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1340210">kfrags88</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2021-07-08">07/08/21 16:10</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I do like testing female/ unisex fragrances to wear for myself (I am a heterosexual male) and would layer some with different molecule compounds to alter the tone for a more masculine offset as I'm very much into gourmand and vanilla notes.<br />
<br />
I tested this out after reading all the reviews on this at first, especially with the opening spray - I wasn't a fan. Though as most fragrances I wanted to give this a chance so I just bought it anyway and tested it for a week and where this shines I feel is the dry down and when its in the air. I layer this with ambroxan, so perhaps that had something to do with it but it was surprisingly pleasant and have received a lot of compliments both female and male.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="43808"comment_id="1372818"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Clandestine-Clara-43808.html?ccid=1372818#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1336625" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.72);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:5,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1336625" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Sarinaamani"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1130845"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1130845.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Sarinaamani" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1336625ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck5x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1336625" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.72); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1130845">Sarinaamani</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2021-05-03">05/03/21 10:22</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Clara will always have a special place in my heart as it was the first fragrance that made me fall into this deep rabbit hole of perfumes. It totally captured my heart at first sniff. At the time, I was unaware of anything perfumes but I saved every penny I could to purchase this bottle at full retail price. <br />
<br />
The notes in here are still notes that I gravitate towards when it comes to scents, vanilla, tobacco, rum, amber and subtle spices. Clara is a boozy ambery warm vanilla that dries down a touch powdery, it doesnt transform much but I dont get bored of it (it doesnt last long enough to get bored of lol). She looks sweet and innocent but theres a dark sensual side to her that very few gets the pleasure of experiencing. She is self aware and gives of idgaf what you think of me you'll love me anyways energy. Layered together with the very bewitching yasmine (amps up the sweetness and longevity) and that is now a signature scent to me. Thats when I feel the most myself. Every time I put this on it reminds me of my first love, Clara.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="43808"comment_id="1336625"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Clandestine-Clara-43808.html?ccid=1336625#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1334658" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.84);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1334658" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Lomama"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1317879"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1317879.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Lomama" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Tom-Ford/Tobacco-Vanille-1825.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.1825.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Tobacco Vanille"title="Tobacco Vanille"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1334658ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1334658" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.84); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1317879">Lomama</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2021-04-29">04/29/21 18:14</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Okay, boozy, I can smell that, but more sweet. Clara is not a barfly. She may have taken a swig before passing by, but she didn't spend the night drinking. The booze and vanilla explain why I want to lick myself when wearing this.<br />
<br />
I don't get any patchouli smell, thank God. Penhaligon's is the MASTER of blending their scents in such a way as to have it super refined, and nothing is cacophonously standing out like a lone note. I like that about them because they do it well, do it for depth and mystery, and they achieve class scents!</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="43808"comment_id="1334658"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Clandestine-Clara-43808.html?ccid=1334658#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1270529" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.75);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:1,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:1,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="1"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; Whew... this opening is rough!</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="43808"comment_id="1270529"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Clandestine-Clara-43808.html?ccid=1270529#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1257055" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.73);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; It's a pity it doesn't last more than 30 mins on my skin!</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="43808"comment_id="1245892"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Clandestine-Clara-43808.html?ccid=1245892#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1234878" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.76);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1234878" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="xabaras"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/24302"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.24302.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="xabaras" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/The-Impudent-Cousin-Matthew-53875.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.53875.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="The Impudent Cousin Matthew"title="The Impudent Cousin Matthew"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1234878ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1234878" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.76); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/24302">xabaras</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2020-10-09">10/09/20 17:44</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I do not get the notes Penhaligon lists: rum, cinnamon and ambery patchouli. What I get is sharp bitter plastic in the opening, and sweeter plastic in the drydown. It may seem unpleasant in the first ten minutes, then it sort of balances with your chemistry and it feels less like someone has poured some ice down your back. It becomes harmless.<br />
I don't think I would ever want to wear this. Not for me. Maybe I do not have the right skin chemistry for it.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="43808"comment_id="1234878"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Clandestine-Clara-43808.html?ccid=1234878#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1216269" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.89);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:4,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; To my nose this is the darker, smokier, more seductive, better dressed sister of Lancome's LVEB.<br />
Although it is smoky and mysterious it has  this comforting and enveloping quality to it. Even if at first sniff I didn't think too much of it, slowly and clandestinely, if you will, it conquered me and I rested in awe at its presence. Very glad I discovered it. Moderate sillage and longevity.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="43808"comment_id="1173088"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Clandestine-Clara-43808.html?ccid=1173088#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1149024" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.88);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;want&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1087898" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Manuscoronum"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1179633"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1179633.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Manuscoronum" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1087898ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1087898" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.89); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1179633">Manuscoronum</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2019-08-14">08/14/19 21:28</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Not my particular fragrance to wear, but i can respect it as an amber gourmand. It really does smell like cinnamon and honey and definitely something warm and boozy.<br />
<br />
It has a deep dirty scent to it when you over-sniff it. I'm smelling something powdery and castoreum like.<br />
<br />
Anyways, I would not wear this out, but it would be better on some pretty lady!<br />
<br />
Sillage is decent, quite a few feet.<br />
<br />
Longevity is quite well with a length of up to 6 hrs.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="43808"comment_id="1087898"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Clandestine-Clara-43808.html?ccid=1087898#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1029067" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.83);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1029067" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="giuseppe98gp83"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1114328"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1114328.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="giuseppe98gp83" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1029067ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck5x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1029067" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.83); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1114328">giuseppe98gp83</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2019-02-07">02/07/19 23:46</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This is a perfect embodiment of mature femininity:<br />
It opens with Patchouli, Rum and amber to finish with Vanilla and cinnamon. Lipstick effect for sure. Not suitable for girls but for mature women who have a taste for the Retro world. Penhaligon's: A house that transmits first of all SIGNORILITY.<br />
I see a woman in full bell'epoque, Art Nouveau ... in short, all the first and part of the second half of the 900 in the bottle. The rights of the fair sex, the "WE CAN DO IT", the masculine woman who resides in all. The woman who dominates and who does not mind to play the role of man: The one and only<br />
MARLENE DIETRICH, with its unfailing cigarette and the air of someone who struts (not surprisingly, the peacock is the symbol of perfume)</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="43808"comment_id="1029067"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Clandestine-Clara-43808.html?ccid=1029067#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1017865" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.72);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1017865" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="flaviano1978"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1178614"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1178614.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="flaviano1978" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Le-Couvent-Maison-de-Parfum/Cologne-of-the-Missions-18811.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.18811.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Cologne of the Missions"title="Cologne of the Missions"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1017865ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1017865" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.72); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1178614">flaviano1978</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2019-01-07">01/07/19 11:46</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Ordered a couple of samples from Penhaligon's and this is one of them.<br />
This is the daughter of their Tralala and Cornubia to me. <br />
The opening reminds me strongly of Tralala but less boozy and the drydown is a reminiscent of a verly light Cornubia.<br />
I won't buy a whole bottle since I already have Tralala.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="43808"comment_id="1017865"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Clandestine-Clara-43808.html?ccid=1017865#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1012298" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.71);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1012298" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="damienthoresson"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1016817"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1016817.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="damienthoresson" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1012298ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck4x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1012298" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.71); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1016817">damienthoresson</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2018-12-22">12/22/18 00:43</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Spectacularly delicious. Is it interesting? Not really, no... but it gets the job done. The job here being relaxation. A soft vanilla and benzoin bomb that lightly envelops you if you apply it once or twice. Otherwise you'll get a headache. <br />
<br />
Soft, non-earthy/hippy patchouli... perhaps a little bit of rum. Quite lovely.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="43808"comment_id="1012298"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Clandestine-Clara-43808.html?ccid=1012298#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent978706" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.85);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; It is not as clean as amber but warmer, deeper and richer which makes it seductive. No wonder Lord George falls for her.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="43808"comment_id="939490"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Clandestine-Clara-43808.html?ccid=939490#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent913367" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.86);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%;
