padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/995817">mohsen95</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2018-02-19">02/19/18 07:20</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>5/10</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="43808"comment_id="913367"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Clandestine-Clara-43808.html?ccid=913367#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent896461" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.76);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc896461" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="mulberryletter23"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1047576"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1047576.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="mulberryletter23" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma896461ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck7x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd896461" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.76); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1047576">mulberryletter23</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2018-01-03">01/03/18 09:27</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Oh, Clara that succubus. I tried really hard not to love her, but she kept beckoning. She'd send late night texts:<br />
<br />
"I know you say you don't like patchouli, but you'll like *this* patchouli." <br />
<br />
"Rum ice cream isn't really drinking."<br />
<br />
"You could sleep so much better with me."<br />
<br />
Sigh. She was about being irresistible, that's for sure. I don't find her boring at all, although the notes may seem simple. The scent is so beautifully balanced and has great longevity for me.<br />
<br />
It also pairs incredibly nicely with a smidge of Jo Loves Smoked Plum &amp; Leather. <br />
<br />
Clara is the fragrance that has received the highest compliments, although that is not why I wear scent at all.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="43808"comment_id="896461"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Clandestine-Clara-43808.html?ccid=896461#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent863242" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.79);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc863242" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Laura01"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/865342"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.865342.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Laura01" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Celine/La-Peau-Nue-57922.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.57922.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="La Peau Nue"title="La Peau Nue"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma863242ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck5x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd863242" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.79); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/865342">Laura01</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2017-09-21">09/21/17 12:24</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I so wanted to like something from Penhaligons but for years i had no luck.. and finally lady Clara arrives. <br />
I tried some on my lunch break and didn't like the opening but as the hours passed I couldn't stop smelling my wrist, the layers of warmth and creaminess started revealing themselves still keeping the notes of spice. By the end of the day I liked it so much that I bought it the same day. So complex and ever-changing. Mysterious and sexy..</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="43808"comment_id="863242"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Clandestine-Clara-43808.html?ccid=863242#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent861843" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.81);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc861843" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="ranchorita"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/434112"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.434112.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="ranchorita" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Trudon/Mortel-46325.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.46325.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Mortel"title="Mortel"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma861843ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck5x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd861843" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.81); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/434112">ranchorita</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2017-09-16">09/16/17 18:29</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Clandestine Clara has my number. This fragrance has enthralled me with boozey swirls of amber, vanilla and patchouli. I think this will be my next full bottle, and has supplanted Elixir as my favorite from Penhaligon's. I will spend this winter enfolded in layers of velvet, suede, silk, and utterly in the thrall of this bewitching Clara. With fire in my heart, I am ready to face the winter.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="43808"comment_id="861843"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Clandestine-Clara-43808.html?ccid=861843#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent838453" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.73);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc838453" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="NormaDesmond"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1068210"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1068210.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="NormaDesmond" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Orto-Parisi/Terroni-45475.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.45475.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Terroni"title="Terroni"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma838453ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x1"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd838453" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.73); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1068210">NormaDesmond</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2017-07-05">07/05/17 00:09</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I tried it on this morning and I was very excited, as I love Penhaligon's. <br />
When I sprayed it on I thought "well, not bad, not outstanding but not bad". <br />
Then, after ten minutes, it developed into a too sweet, powdery smell that had nothing to do with the spicy opening. Nah, not for me.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="43808"comment_id="838453"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Clandestine-Clara-43808.html?ccid=838453#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent834964" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.77);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; It just works so well with my skin chemistry, and smells warm and inviting, a little bit smoky and more than a little bit sexy. One of my sweetie's favourite perfumes too, he always comments when I wear it.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="43808"comment_id="834964"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Clandestine-Clara-43808.html?ccid=834964#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent823603" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.75);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc823603" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="originaldeftom"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/7036"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.7036.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="originaldeftom" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma823603ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x0"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd823603" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.75); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/7036">originaldeftom</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2017-05-17">05/17/17 16:44</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Reminiscent of Cacharel pour homme, but in a far more cloying and heavily patchouli polluted dusty kind of way.<br />
<br />
Headache-inducing!<br />
<br />
I miss releases like "Amaranthine" and "Ostara" that were ingenuine, idiosyncratic, FRENCH, and so much more creative.<br />
<br />
This is just yet another attempt to please spend-hungry Arabs with a heavy, ugly, cloying scent that for once does not contain Oudh.<br />
<br />
Still a miss from me.  I also don't like the new Puig takeover in terms of store designs or the fact they discontinue perfectly fine Duchauffour creations, just because they don't sell (but I digress).<br />
<br />
This is just awful!</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="43808"comment_id="823603"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Clandestine-Clara-43808.html?ccid=823603#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent796816" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.78);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2185644" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="faunwand"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1220622"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1220622.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="faunwand" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Clarins/Eau-Ressourcante-2827.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.2827.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Eau Ressourcante"title="Eau Ressourcante"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2185644ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck5x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2185644" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.87); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1220622">faunwand</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-06-12">06/12/24 02:02</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This scent has a vibe of slipping into a cozy cashmere sweater on a winter day. It's labeled 'for women' but I think anyone could enjoy it. It has a classy vibe that screams sophistication. The rum at the start is a fancy touch. It feels smooth and luxurious. The cinnamon gives it a spicy kick and the vanilla adds a sweet creaminess. Patchouli makes it a bit earthy at the end.Overall, it's classy and timeless.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="43808"comment_id="2185644"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Clandestine-Clara-43808.html?ccid=2185644#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1130786" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.87);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;want&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; I haven't smelled all of this fun Penhaligon's line, but Clara just ticks all the right boxes to make me feel warm, luxurious and comforted all at the same time, and lasts forever on my skin. <br />
<br />
Happy!!</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="43808"comment_id="1130786"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Clandestine-Clara-43808.html?ccid=1130786#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1336625" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.79);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:5,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1336625" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Sarinaamani"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1130845"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1130845.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Sarinaamani" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1336625ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck5x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1336625" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.79); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1130845">Sarinaamani</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2021-05-03">05/03/21 10:22</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Clara will always have a special place in my heart as it was the first fragrance that made me fall into this deep rabbit hole of perfumes. It totally captured my heart at first sniff. At the time, I was unaware of anything perfumes but I saved every penny I could to purchase this bottle at full retail price. <br />
<br />
The notes in here are still notes that I gravitate towards when it comes to scents, vanilla, tobacco, rum, amber and subtle spices. Clara is a boozy ambery warm vanilla that dries down a touch powdery, it doesnt transform much but I dont get bored of it (it doesnt last long enough to get bored of lol). She looks sweet and innocent but theres a dark sensual side to her that very few gets the pleasure of experiencing. She is self aware and gives of idgaf what you think of me you'll love me anyways energy. Layered together with the very bewitching yasmine (amps up the sweetness and longevity) and that is now a signature scent to me. Thats when I feel the most myself. Every time I put this on it reminds me of my first love, Clara.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="43808"comment_id="1336625"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Clandestine-Clara-43808.html?ccid=1336625#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent863242" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.72);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc863242" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Laura01"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/865342"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.865342.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Laura01" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Celine/La-Peau-Nue-57922.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.57922.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="La Peau Nue"title="La Peau Nue"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma863242ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck5x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd863242" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.72); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/865342">Laura01</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2017-09-21">09/21/17 12:24</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I so wanted to like something from Penhaligons but for years i had no luck.. and finally lady Clara arrives. <br />
I tried some on my lunch break and didn't like the opening but as the hours passed I couldn't stop smelling my wrist, the layers of warmth and creaminess started revealing themselves still keeping the notes of spice. By the end of the day I liked it so much that I bought it the same day. So complex and ever-changing. Mysterious and sexy..</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="43808"comment_id="863242"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Clandestine-Clara-43808.html?ccid=863242#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent861843" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.81);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc861843" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="ranchorita"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/434112"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.434112.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="ranchorita" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Trudon/Mortel-46325.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.46325.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Mortel"title="Mortel"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma861843ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck5x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd861843" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.81); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/434112">ranchorita</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2017-09-16">09/16/17 18:29</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Clandestine Clara has my number. This fragrance has enthralled me with boozey swirls of amber, vanilla and patchouli. I think this will be my next full bottle, and has supplanted Elixir as my favorite from Penhaligon's. I will spend this winter enfolded in layers of velvet, suede, silk, and utterly in the thrall of this bewitching Clara. With fire in my heart, I am ready to face the winter.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="43808"comment_id="861843"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Clandestine-Clara-43808.html?ccid=861843#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div>                            <reviews-infinity :random-colors="[&quot;#fefcee&quot;,&quot;#faf7ec&quot;,&quot;#f9f9f3&quot;,&quot;#f8f9ec&quot;,&quot;#fffdea&quot;,&quot;#faf9fb&quot;,&quot;#faf5f2&quot;,&quot;#f7f4f2&quot;]" :perfume-id="43808" sentiment="positive"></reviews-infinity>
            </div>
</div>
</div><div class="tabs-panel" id="popular-negative-reviews"><div class="cell">
    <div class="strike-title"><span>Most Popular Negative Reviews</span></div>
    <div class="grid-x grid-padding-x grid-margin-y" style="position: relative; padding: 0 0.25rem 0 0.25rem;">
                            <div id="parent1526541" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.74);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:2,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="2"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1526541" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Mira J"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1379804"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1379804.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Mira J" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Dior/Vanilla-Diorama-68198.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.68198.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Vanilla Diorama"title="Vanilla Diorama"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1526541ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1526541" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.74); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1379804">Mira J</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-03-19">03/19/22 15:32</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I almost blind bought this as the notes were a no brainer to me but thankfully purchased a sample first. That dreaded play-doh vibe....noooo. I wonder what is giving off that scent to my nose? I can NOT deal with fragrances that give me any type of play-doh nuances. You couldn't pay me to wear hypnotic poison. So let down.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="43808"comment_id="1526541"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Clandestine-Clara-43808.html?ccid=1526541#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1519763" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.73);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:2,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="2"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1519763" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="thegoob"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1112396"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1112396.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="thegoob" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Indult/Tihota-4346.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.4346.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Tihota"title="Tihota"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1519763ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1519763" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.73); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1112396">thegoob</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-03-09">03/09/22 12:29</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>On my skin I very sincerely got realistic, simplistic, play doh and baby wipes. An hour or so later I got some nicely done smoke but the initial character did not change. This, to me, is not a gourmand but a very cosmetic vanilla-amber that has the aforementioned uncanny resemblance to infant products. My perception seems to be uncommon, however, so those around you will probably enjoy this. Its not for me unfortunately!</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="43808"comment_id="1519763"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Clandestine-Clara-43808.html?ccid=1519763#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1270529" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.77);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:1,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:1,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="1"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%;                 <div id="popBrands" class="strike-title" style="margin-top: 4em;"><span>Most Popular Brands</span></div>
            <div class="grid-x grid-margin-y grid-margin-x text-center">
        <div class="cell small-4 medium-2 flex-container flex-dir-column">
        <div style="display: flex; align-items: start; text-align: start; line-height: 1.2em; height: 1.7em; overflow: hidden;">
        <span style="white-space: nowrap; color: lightsteelblue">1.&nbsp;</span>
        <span style="display: -webkit-box; -webkit-line-clamp: 1; -webkit-box-orient: vertical; overflow: hidden; text-overflow: ellipsis;">
            <a href="https://www.fragrantica.com/designers/Lattafa-Perfumes.html" class="en2inter">Lattafa Perfumes</a>
        </span>
    </div>
            <div style="display: flex; align-items: start; text-align: start; line-height: 1.2em; height: 1.7em; overflow: hidden;">
        <span style="white-space: nowrap; color: lightsteelblue">2.&nbsp;</span>

    <script>

<script  data-cfasync="false">
    // Check that service workers are supported
    if ('serviceWorker' in navigator) {
        // Use the window load event to keep the page load performant
        window.addEventListener('load', () => {
            navigator.serviceWorker.register('/service-worker.js?v=rtgFFe5cbbe5e5f689826b719ace22a5b2a11');
        });
    }
</script>
